candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (7 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, RIOT follows crypto cycles and exhibits high volatility, similar to MARA. Swarm Consensus (3 votes): xai: CLSK (CleanSpark) mirrors WULF and MARA as a crypto mining play with high volatility driven by Bitcoin cycles and operational expansions. It has shown boom/bust patterns, surging during crypto bull runs and crashing in bears. Recent weakness follows a post-halving dip and energy cost pressures, positioning it for mean reversion if crypto sentiment improves, as mining stocks historically overshoot to the downside before snapping back. Commodity exposure via energy-intensive mining. Matches goldmine patterns: crypto cycles, high volatility, and sharp reversals like SOL-USD.; claude_haiku: Cryptocurrency mining with extreme volatility similar to WULF. Follows macro crypto sentiment swings. Retail interest in mining plays during bull markets, sharp reversals during downturns. Clean technical mean reversion setup.
